json_to_edit.voice_over: Be careful what you wish for, they say. I never truly understood until that fateful day at the wishing well.
json_to_edit.description: Sarah and her friends discover the consequences of their wishes at the town's ancient wishing well.
json_to_edit.location: Town square with an old wishing well
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Distant chatter, coins clinking, gentle breeze
json_to_edit.name: The Wishing Well's Twist
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Sarah and her friends make wishes at the town's ancient well, only to face unexpected and sometimes troubling consequences.

qa.action: Sarah, Mark, and a small crowd gather around the ornate wishing well in the town square.

hf.action: Sarah tosses a coin into the well, her eyes closed in concentration as she makes her wish.

tr.action: The coin hits the water, creating ripples that shimmer with an otherworldly glow.

xc.action: Mark suddenly sprouts vibrant blue hair, much to everyone's surprise and his horror.

ka.action: The town square begins to transform, buildings shifting and changing colors as people's wishes take effect.

fn.action: Old Maggie watches from the shadows, a knowing and slightly worried expression on her face.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every two existing shots, showing Mayor Thompson's increasingly concerned reactions. Don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: Be careful what you wish for, they say. I never truly understood until that fateful day at the wishing well.
updated_json.description: Sarah and her friends discover the consequences of their wishes at the town's ancient wishing well.
updated_json.location: Town square with an old wishing well
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Distant chatter, coins clinking, gentle breeze
updated_json.name: The Wishing Well's Twist
updated_json.scene_summary: Sarah and her friends make wishes at the town's ancient well, only to face unexpected and sometimes troubling consequences.

qa.action: Sarah, Mark, and a small crowd gather around the ornate wishing well in the town square.

hf.action: Sarah tosses a coin into the well, her eyes closed in concentration as she makes her wish.

rt.action: Mayor Thompson watches from nearby, his brow furrowing slightly as he observes the scene.

tr.action: The coin hits the water, creating ripples that shimmer with an otherworldly glow.

xc.action: Mark suddenly sprouts vibrant blue hair, much to everyone's surprise and his horror.

yz.action: Mayor Thompson's eyes widen, and he takes a step forward, his hands fidgeting with concern.

ka.action: The town square begins to transform, buildings shifting and changing colors as people's wishes take effect.

fn.action: Old Maggie watches from the shadows, a knowing and slightly worried expression on her face.

ab.action: Mayor Thompson's face is etched with alarm, his eyes darting around as he realizes the full extent of the situation.

label.rationale: we will add three new shots showing mayor thompson's increasingly concerned reactions after every two existing shots. this will enhance the scene by showing the authority figure's growing worry as the consequences of the wishes unfold. we'll insert these new shots without altering the existing ones, maintaining the original flow while adding depth to the scene.

value.action: Mayor Thompson watches from nearby, his brow furrowing slightly as he observes the scene.
